New SWEREF99-nu Icon Design

Design Features:

  • Stylized map with green landmasses representing terrain
  • Blue water background for geographic context
  • Red location pin with white center, angled slightly for visual appeal
  • Pin positioned on land area as requested
  • Clean, modern design suitable for Swedish coordinate system app
